src:
香港行政長官、６日に中国副首相と会談…さらなる対応迫られる可能性

03 Nov 2019, 12:14



２日、香港でガラスが割られた新華社通信の香港支社（ＡＰ）

　【広州＝角谷志保美】香港政府は３日、トップの林鄭月娥（りんていげつが）行政長官が６日に北京で中国政府で香港政策を担当する韓（ハン）正（ジョン）筆頭副首相と会談すると発表した。
　中国共産党は１０月末の第１９期中央委員会第４回総会（４中総会）で、抗議運動が続く香港へ介入を強化する姿勢を示した。香港メディアは、林鄭氏が会談でさらなる対応を迫られる可能性を報じている。
　一方、２日のデモで中国国営の新華社通信香港支社が襲撃されたのを受け、中国で司法・警察部門を指導する共産党中央政法委員会は中国のＳＮＳに３日、「香港の暴徒は既に文明の最低の一線を越えた」と題する文書を発表し、「絶対に法律の懲罰を免れない」と断じた。また、香港警察は３日、２日のデモに関連し２００人以上を拘束したと発表した。
text:
Hong Kong Administration Secretary meets with Chinese Deputy Prime Minister on 6th

03 Nov 2019, 12:14



Hong Kong branch (AP) of Xinhua News Agency, whose glass was broken in Hong Kong on the 2nd

[Guangzhou = Shihomi Kakutani] On the 3rd, the Hong Kong government is headed by the top deputy prime minister, Han, who is responsible for Hong Kong policy by the Chinese government in Beijing on the 6th. Announced to meet.
The Communist Party of China showed its stance to strengthen intervention in Hong Kong, followed by protests, at the 19th Central Committee 4th General Meeting (4th General Meeting) at the end of October. The Hong Kong media reports that Mr. Lin may be forced to take further action at the meeting.
On the other hand, in response to an attack on the Chinese state-run Xinhua News Agency Hong Kong branch in the two-day demonstration, the Communist Party's Central Political Commission, which leads the judicial and police department in China, told China's SNS on the 3rd. He released a document titled “Beyond the lowest line of civilization” and refused to say “I can't escape the punishment of the law”. The Hong Kong police also announced that they had detained more than 200 people in connection with the demonstration on the 3rd and 2nd.
